r.d: Parser for Resource Description Framework (RDF) Site Summary (RSS) documents.
r.n:
This release is a beta release in preparation for the upcoming stable release of version 1.0.0.
* Allows string inputs (useful for cached feeds, e.g. from databases) * Fixes dependency on XML_Parser and removes erroneous dependency on XML_Tree * Fixed bug #557 * Fixed bug #2045 * Fixed bug #2310 * Fixed bug #2782 * Fixed bug #3871 * Added unit tests
